Directions: In a large bowl, combine the corn, beans, tomatoes and onions. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients; add to corn mixture and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Serve with a slotted spoon.
Ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies, undrained
